lead_paragraph: The story of Robert Durst, awaiting trial in the killing of his friend Susan Berman, is familiar. But her story, that of a skilled storyteller racked by depression, is only now emerging.

headline.print_headline: Durst Trial’s Key Figure: A Mobster’s Daughter,  a Writer, a Murder Victim
headline.main: Mobster’s Daughter, Writer, Murder Victim: Woman at Center of Durst Trial

snippet: The story of Robert Durst, awaiting trial in the killing of his friend Susan Berman, is familiar. But her story, that of a skilled storyteller racked by depression, is only now emerging....
abstract: Story of Susan Berman, woman Robert Durst is accused of killing in 2000, is only now emerging in murder trial dominated largely by Durst himself; friends describe Berman, struggling journalist and screenwriter, as talented but troubled storyteller.
